text: 2024-2025 Spring/Incoming Student Report You have been invited to participate in an evaluation survey regarding 2024/2025 Sping Semester at Sabanci University. We kindly ask you to complete the evaluation as your opinions are highly important to us. There are 47 questions in this survey.
